sources.title: Hellgate (1952) STERLING HAYDENüçï CLASSIC WESTERNüçï  FULL MOVIE
sources.description:
It's FRIDAY @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Sterling Hayden, Ward Bond, James Arness
Director: Charles Marquis Warren

An innocent man is sentenced to a Hellgate, an inescapable prison built into caverns below New Mexico's rugged, scorched desert. Watch Hollywood tough guy Sterling Hayden in his most visceral and brutal role. With Ward Bond as the vicious, vengeful warden and the always bad-to-bone Robert J. Wilkie.  This is hard time and not for the faint of heart.

TRIVIA: This post-Civil War yarn was strongly influenced by the story of Dr. Mudd (the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth,) which was adapted into the 1936 movie The Prisoner of Shark Island.

metadata.Plot: A man is accused of spying for the confedaracy, and sentenced to the notorious Hellgate Prison. After he unsuccessfully attempts to breakout, and is sentenced to solitary confinement, he redeems himself when the prison is taken down by a plague.
metadata.Writer: Charles Marquis Warren, John C. Champion
metadata.Actors: Sterling Hayden, Joan Leslie, Ward Bond
